scripts.build:site: turbo run build --filter='./packages/*' && pnpm run build:site:apps && pnpm run build:site:compose
scripts.build:site:apps: pnpm --filter @paramanu/docs build && STORYBOOK_BASE=/storybook/react/ pnpm --filter @paramanu/storybook-react build && STORYBOOK_BASE=/storybook/vanilla/ pnpm --filter @paramanu/storybook-vanilla build
scripts.build:site:compose: mkdir -p apps/docs/dist/storybook && cp -r apps/storybook-react/dist apps/docs/dist/storybook/react && cp -r apps/storybook-vanilla/dist apps/docs/dist/storybook/vanilla
scripts.ci: pnpm lint && pnpm format:check && pnpm build && pnpm typecheck && pnpm test
